gen:link.msg:message: The date reported for `DocumentAdoptionDate` SHOULD be earlier than, or equal to, the current date. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierThanEQDateCurrent1_DocumentAdoptionDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierThanEQDateCurrent1_DocumentAdoptionDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The date reported for `FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate` MUST be earlier than the date reported for `DocumentAdoptionDate`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierDateLater1_FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierDateLater1_FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierDateLater1_DocumentAdoptionDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierDateLater1_DocumentAdoptionDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The date reported for `FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate` SHOULD be earlier than the current date. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierThanCurrent1_FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierThanCurrent1_FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The date reported for `FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentStartDate` MUST be earlier than the date reported for `FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierDateLater3_FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentStartDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierDateLater3_FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentStartDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierDateLater3_FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierDateLater3_FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The date reported for `FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousEndDate` MUST be one day earlier than the date reported for `FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentStartDate`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlier24HDateLater1_FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousEndDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlier24HDateLater1_FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousEndDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlier24HDateLater1_FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentStartDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlier24HDateLater1_FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentStartDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The date reported for `FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousStartDate` MUST be earlier than the date reported for `FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousEndDate`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierDateLater2_FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousStartDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierDateLater2_FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousStartDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierDateLater2_FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousEndDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierDateLater2_FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousEndDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The date reported for `FinancialStatementsDateOfPreparation` SHOULD be earlier than, or equal to, the date reported for `DocumentAdoptionDate`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierEQDateLater1_FinancialStatementsDateOfPreparation')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierEQDateLater1_FinancialStatementsDateOfPreparation return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierEQDateLater1_DocumentAdoptionDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierEQDateLater1_DocumentAdoptionDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The reported value MUST be used with measure pure. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_AllMeasureEqualToPure1_AllPureConcepts')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_AllMeasureEqualToPure1_AllPureConcepts return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The reported value MUST be used with measure shares. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_AllMeasureEqualToShares1_AllSharesConcepts')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_AllMeasureEqualToShares1_AllSharesConcepts return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The reported value SHOULD be used with the measure equal to the fact reported for `DocumentPresentationCurrency`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_AllMeasureEqualToReportedValue1_DocumentPresentationCurrency')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_AllMeasureEqualToReportedValue1_DocumentPresentationCurrency return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_AllMeasureEqualToReportedValue1_AllMonetaryItems')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_AllMeasureEqualToReportedValue1_AllMonetaryItems return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The reported value of `FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualStatus` SHOULD be equal to `Ja`, because the period from `FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentStartDate` to `FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate` differs from than the standard reporting period of one year. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierNEYearDateLaterThnValue1_Set03FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualStatus')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierNEYearDateLaterThnValue1_Set03FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualStatus return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierNEYearDateLaterThnValue1_Set01FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentStartDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierNEYearDateLaterThnValue1_Set01FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentStartDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierNEYearDateLaterThnValue1_Set02FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierNEYearDateLaterThnValue1_Set02FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The reported value of `FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualStatus` SHOULD be equal to `Nee`, because the period from `FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentStartDate` to `FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate` is equal to the standard reporting period of one year. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierEQYearDateLaterThnValue1_Set03FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualStatus')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierEQYearDateLaterThnValue1_Set03FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualStatus return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierEQYearDateLaterThnValue1_Set01FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentStartDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierEQYearDateLaterThnValue1_Set01FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentStartDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierEQYearDateLaterThnValue1_Set02FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtDateEarlierEQYearDateLaterThnValue1_Set02FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`DocumentAdoptionDate` MUST NOT be reported, because the reported value of `DocumentAdoptionStatus` is equal to `Nee`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnNoExistence2_DocumentAdoptionStatus')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnNoExistence2_DocumentAdoptionStatus return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnNoExistence2_DocumentAdoptionDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnNoExistence2_DocumentAdoptionDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`DocumentAdoptionDate` MUST exist at least once, because the reported value of `DocumentAdoptionStatus` is equal to `Ja`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnExistence3_DocumentAdoptionStatus')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnExistence3_DocumentAdoptionStatus return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
`DocumentAdoptionStatus` MUST exist once.
`DocumentPresentationCurrency` MUST exist once.

`DocumentResubmissionDueToTechnicalAndOrProcesRelatedInaccuraciesExplanation` MUST exist at least once, because the reported value of `DocumentResubmissionDueToTechnicalAndOrProcesRelatedInaccuracies` is equal to `Ja`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnExistence4_DocumentResubmissionDueToTechnicalAndOrProcesRelatedInaccuracies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnExistence4_DocumentResubmissionDueToTechnicalAndOrProcesRelatedInaccuracies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`DocumentResubmissionDueToUnsurmountableInaccuraciesExplanation` MUST exist at least once, because the reported value of `DocumentResubmissionDueToUnsurmountableInaccuracies` is equal to `Ja`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnExistence5_DocumentResubmissionDueToUnsurmountableInaccuracies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnExistence5_DocumentResubmissionDueToUnsurmountableInaccuracies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
`EmailAddressFull` MUST exist once.
`FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDate` MUST exist once.
`FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentStartDate` MUST exist once.

`FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualImpactComparatives` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualStatus` is equal to `Nee`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnNoExistence1_FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualStatus')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnNoExistence1_FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualStatus return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnNoExistence1_FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualImpactComparatives')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnNoExistence1_FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualImpactComparatives return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualImpactComparatives` SHOULD exist at least once, because the reported value of `FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualStatus` is equal to `Ja`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnExistence2_FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualStatus')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnExistence2_FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualStatus return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualReasonDescription` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualStatus` is equal to `Nee`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnNoExistence3_FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualStatus')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnNoExistence3_FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualStatus return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnNoExistence3_FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualReasonDescription')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnNoExistence3_FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualReasonDescription return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualReasonDescription` SHOULD exist at least once, because the reported value of `FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualStatus` is equal to `Ja`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnExistence1_FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualStatus')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtValueThnExistence1_FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualStatus return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
`FinancialReportingPeriodDifferentThanAnnualStatus` MUST exist once.
`FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousEndDate` MUST not exist or at most once.

`FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousEndDate` SHOULD exist at least once within the same context, because `FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousStartDate` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtExistenceThnExistence2_FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousStartDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtExistenceThnExistence2_FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousStartDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
`FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousStartDate` MUST not exist or at most once.

`FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousStartDate` SHOULD exist at least once within the same context, because `FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousEndDate` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtExistenceThnExistence1_FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousEndDate')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformation_PrtExistenceThnExistence1_FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousEndDate return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
`FinancialStatementsDateOfPreparation` MUST exist once.
